**بصفتي ** [role]  
 **احتاج الى** [function]  
 **حتى احصل على** [benefit]  
   
 ### الافتراضات Details and Assumptions
 * [document what you know]
   
 ### Acceptance Criteria  معايير القبول
   
 ```gherkin
 Given [نظرا لانني ]
 When [certain action is taken]
 Then [the outcome of action is observed]
 ```
